unnormalised: I love athlete biographies! Reading about Sachin Tendulkar's early days in Shivaji Park is so inspiring. Like, did he *really* practice that much? Even "Chak De! India" doesn't prepare you for the sheer dedication! Knowing PV Sindhu started training so young in Hyderabad makes her Olympic medals even more amazing. What a journey from Andhra Pradesh! I wonder how many kms they run per day. Gotta read Milkha Singh's biography next! Rs. 200 well spent.
normalised: I love athlete biographies! Reading about Sachin Tendulkar's early days in Shivaji Park is so inspiring. Like, did he really practice that much? Even Chak De! India doesn't prepare you for the sheer dedication! Knowing P V Sindhu started training so young in Hyderabad makes her Olympic medals even more amazing. What a journey from Andhra Pradesh! I wonder how many kilometers they run per day. Gotta read Milkha Singh's biography next! Rupee two hundred well spent.
